title: RP art
body: Hi does anyone know how long it takes for the ticket to be reviewed? I've submitted it for 3 hours now but no one has checked it yet :(. I only need 36 rp x_X

replies.body: Depending on where it's being fielded, it may have a higher volume due to holidays.  I can help with this though.  :)  If you draw me a poro enjoying the winter, maybe I can work something out.  :)

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RZedxdsT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-28T21:40:57.845+0000)
>
> Depending on where it's being fielded, it may have a higher volume due to holidays.  I can help with this though.  :)  If you draw me a poro enjoying the winter, maybe I can work something out.  :)

Hey! i already drew them a picture but i can draw you one as well give me a second.
Oh did you?  What's your ticket number?  I'll accept that.  :D

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RZedxdsT,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-28T21:45:39.637+0000)
>
> Oh did you?  What's your ticket number?  I'll accept that.  :D

https://i.imgur.com/KsDqupz.png I just drew this and my ticket number is 33166946
LOVE THIS.  Thank you for this super cute drawing.  :D  Some poros may have added the RP to your account.
